titles.title: A bill to reliquidate certain entries on which excessive countervailing duties were paid, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S5947)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 5/13/1993--Introduced. Provides, upon request filed with the appropriate customs officer, for the reliquidation (refund) of excessive countervailing duties (plus interest) that were imposed on specified entries into the United States.
